title: Seldarine Drow
content:
Seldarine Drow Racial Features Base Racial Speed Drow Weapon Training Fey Ancestry Superior Darkvision Subrace Traits N/A

Base Racial Speed Drow Weapon Training Fey Ancestry Superior Darkvision

Seldarine Drow is a Subrace of Drow in Baldur's Gate 3. Seldarine Drow have +1 Charisma and +2 Dexterity. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide dif
